it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.model.cards

Class Deck<T extends Card>

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.model.cards.Deck<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of card for the deck
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EscapeDeck, ItemDeck, SectorDeck

    public abstract class Deck<T extends Card>
extends java.lang.Object
    The generic deck type. Provides a few useful methods for all the decks.
    Author:
    GerlandoSavio
